h2.a: This Vine 'Teaser Trailer' For Wolverine Just Gave Us A Seizure

div.p: Hugh Jackman’s constipation face. Hugh Jackman’s massive pecs. Hugh Jackman’s yelling face. Now look! Hugh Jackman is flying, somehow. Oh, and a hashtag.

h2.a: Why Do TV Critics Hate Jay Leno?

div.p: Noo, don't hack the mainframes! Anything but the mainframes!

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZQFCRa hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: America's $124 Billion Secret Welfare Program

div.p: The number of former workers enrolled in the Social Security disability program has more than doubled in the last two decades, and the reasons why have little to do with the health of our workforce.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10GlnqO hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: IT'S JUST AS WEIRD AS YOU'D THINK

h2.a: So, There's A Pinterest For Dudes Now

div.p: It's called Manteresting.com. You can really gather some manteresting observations regarding the male gender on a cursory persusal.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10tbz37 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: What Extremely Successful People Were Doing At Age 25

div.p: Some people know what they want to do from an early age and focus on it relentlessly. Others reinvent themselves, changing careers and industries until they find something that works.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Yu8diE hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: How To Buy A New Computer (If It's 1993)

div.p: This is just trippy.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10F5hgZ hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: PREQUEL TO THE GUIDE TO SH*TTING AT WORK

h2.a: The Complete Guide To Eating At Work

div.p: There’s no avoiding it. Work an eight-hour day (or longer) and you’ll have to stop to eat at some point. But what should you eat to achieve maximum results? And is skipping lunch to polish off that email really such a bad thing?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YPEqds hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The Secret Airline That's Flooding Syria With Weapons

div.p: The CIA has never really gotten out of the illicit airline business. Here's how they're secretly smuggling Croatian arms into Syria.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11it3hK hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: What The Next iOS Should Look Like

div.p: Designer Jesse Head took a crack at redesigning how iOS handles multitasking. Long story short, Apple should listen.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14oaxJn hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: How Businesses Are Staying Ahead Of China's Counterfeiters

div.p: China's vast resources, large pool of talented workers and economies of scale have cemented its place at the forefront of global manufacturing. But it's also made it the epicenter of counterfeiting. Here's how companies are fighting back.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YP4tl0 hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: BUT ELSA SURVIVED IN REAL LIFE

h2.a: The Real Nazi Search For The Holy Grail

div.p: A new exhibition in Germany about archaeology under the Nazis shows how the regime launched a 'Last Crusade' expedition in wartime to find the Holy Grail from the Last Supper of Christ.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11DILI2 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Meet The Man At The Forefront Of Open Sourcing 3D Printed Guns

div.p: Cody R Wilson has figured out how to print a semi-automatic rifle from the comfort of his own home. Now he's putting all the information online so that others will join him.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YCwpta hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Hunt For Bogus War Heroes

div.p: During the past decade, some 4,000 men have been exposed while posing as combat warriors to fool women, scam federal benefits and reap undeserved praise.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YAgjU9 hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: TOUGH WORK IF YOU CAN GET IT

h2.a: The Economics Of Being A Stand-Up Comedian In The Midwest

div.p: Being funny can be expensive in a place like Grand Rapids, Mich., where comedians often have to travel great distances looking for a gig.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Znb6ek hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: CAN'T DO YOUR HOMEWORK FOR YOU THOUGH

h2.a: This Blob Of 'Intelligent' Goo Is Better At Math Than You

div.p: A blob of “intelligent” goo can compute solutions to one of the most famous problems in mathematics and produces a route map as well, say computer scientists.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10dlLuq hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: What Can Bees Teach Us About Gang Warfare?

div.p: In Los Angeles, an anthropologist is using equations to teach police about how street gangs operate.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Y9YLia hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: SO EVERYONE CAN SEE YOUR GREAT HAIR

h2.a: This Is Really An Invisible Bicycle Helmet And It's Really Awesome

div.p: Bike helmets are generally hideous. Plus they ruin your hair. Not anymore.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZORCmd hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: If The Military's Future Stealth Jet Fails, The Navy's Got A Backup Plan

div.p: The U.S. Navy is carefully backing away from the troubled F-35 Joint Strike Fighter program — and putting in place a backup plan in case the trillion-dollar, jack-of-all-trades stealth jet can’t recover from mounting technical and budgetary woes. So much for the F-35 being too big to fail.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15Kc6gI hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Every Known Drone Strike And Victim In Pakistan In One Interactive

div.p: This one interactive brings home just how many drone strikes there have been so far and the casualties involved.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10bfOOI hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Death By 1,000 Paper Cuts

div.p: "Sometimes being a software engineer means death by 1000 cuts because you don't have the power to make it stop,. Even the tiniest little things add up to something big — sometimes it's really death by 1000 paper cuts."

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11BLn5r hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Man Behind Sexpigeon

div.p: He was a shy West Coast transplant alone in the big city. But equipped with his iPhone camera and a healthy dose of snark, all of New York's pedestrians suddenly became fair game.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YszdiD hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Seal Pup Lost In The Forest Gets Rescued By Kind Hunter

div.p: A seal pup’s life basically turned into a Disney movie this weekend when the adorable critter got lost in a Swedish forest, four miles from the open sea it calls home.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YBp2SK hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: THESE DRONES DON'T WANT TO KILL YOU

h2.a: Inside NASA's Hurricane Drone Lab

div.p: Take a behind the scenes tour of the US space agency's unmanned aerial vehicle program.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YqLzru hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Where In The World Is Matt Lauer's Career?

div.p: The truest truism of morning-TV shows is that they are like families, or aspire to be—it’s a matter of practiced artifice, faked from the first minute to the last. But reality can’t always be kept out of the picture.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14noUhd hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Nintendo's Efforts To Explain The Wii U Just Took A Turn For The Absurd

div.p: Nintendo has apparently ramped up its efforts to explain just what the hell that big, glaring "U" means.
